nodes.text: Yaltza was an Imperial officer who served the Galactic Empire, holding the rank of major. Major Yaltza was placed in charge of Project Swarm, an Imperial operation that intended to locate the headquarters of the Rebel Alliance. In 3 ABY, the Sith Lord Darth Vader assessed the project, and executed Major Yaltza for making insufficient progress. General Maximilian Veers was chosen to replace Yaltza, informing Project Swarm's team of archaeologists aboard the flagship Executor of the major's failure.
Yaltza was mentioned in the comic Doctor Aphra 37, written by Simon Spurrier and published by Marvel Comics on October 2, 2019.
